import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class Hourly extends Component { state={ dayInformation: [] } componentDidMount(){ const city = this.props.location.state.city; console.log(city); axios.get('http://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/forecast?q='+city+'&appid=57808ae0e0093dd410d6cf81f988f653&units=imperial') .then(res => { console.log(res) this.setState({ dayInformation: res.data.list }) }) } render() { const { dayInformation } = this.state; const dayCards = dayInformation.length ? ( dayInformation.map(day=>{ return(
{day.main.weather[0].main}
) }) ):(
